entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
